title: Pot Legalization: A Lesson for Obama | Real News
description:
The table debates whether a de facto federal nullification approach, like legalizing pot in Colorado and Washington, could be a useful method for individual states to fight Obamacare.

Watch full episodes of Real News on demand with a subscription to TheB
